success_criteria.notes: Success if the assistant creates a recurring one-on-one meeting series every second Thursday morning with Sarah via create_recurring_meeting, with a 45-minute duration that fits around Andrew's on-farm work and avoids late evenings due to early starts.

task.objective: Set up a fortnightly one-on-one catch-up with Sarah, the local DPI agronomist, to review crop monitoring data and plan low-chemical management strategies.

injected_behaviors.instructions: The user is Andrew Watson, a cotton and grain grower near Boggabri in regional New South Wales. He wants a regular one-on-one with his local DPI agronomist, Sarah, to go over soil moisture readings, beneficial insect counts, and spray savings data. He prefers early Thursday mornings (before he heads out to the paddock), sometime between 6:30 am and 8:30 am Australia/Sydney time. He can be a bit flexible on the exact time, but he wants it locked in as a recurring fortnightly meeting during the growing season, starting from mid-December 2025. If there are clashes, the assistant should suggest the nearest earlier morning slot on Thursday, or as a backup, the same time on Wednesday.
